item.foolsjourney.spirit_pendulum.fail_s: Your spirituality is insufficient to guide the pendulum...
item.foolsjourney.spirit_pendulum.found: The pendulum trembles... It points to a treasure!
item.foolsjourney.spirit_pendulum.not_fo: The pendulum remains still. Nothing valuable nearby.
item.foolsjourney.spirit_pendulum.track_: Could not locate %s. They might be too far or offline.
message.foolsjourney.seer_potion_consume: You begin to feel the strings of fate... (Sequence 9: Seer)
message.foolsjourney.already_beyonder: You are already walking a path, consuming more brings madness!
